job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongJOB DESCRIPTIONstrongppbrpulliApply advanced machine learning deep learning and NLPNLU techniques to build cutting edge AI applicationsliliUse effective text representation techniques to develop useful featuresliliWrite productionready code in Python applying coding and OOP best practicesliliDevelop and deliver software using Python and various AI related libraries applying the corporate SDLC and support continuous integration and continuous deployment of the microservices Use containerization orchestration DevOps for faster delivery and easier maintenanceliliDefine and implement evaluation strategies for each required functionality demonstrate applicability and performance of the delivered application and communicate clearly on its limitsliliCollaborate with the various teamsnbsppresent plans ideas and deliverablesliulpbrppstrongJob QualificationstrongppnbsppulliBachelors degree in computer science mathematics or related fieldliliAt least one year of experience as a natural language processing engineerliliKnowledge of data structures semantic extraction and modellingliliKnowledge of text representation eg ngrams sentiment analysis bag of words etcliul
